title.rendered: If You Can’t Shallow The Club Watch This Now – NR

content.rendered:
If You Can’t Shallow the Club Watch This Now

[tcb-script type=”text/javascript”](function (v, i, d, a, l, y, t, c, s) { y=’_’+d.toLowerCase();c=d+’L’;if(!v[d]){v[d]={};}if(!v[c]){v[c]={};}if(!v[y]){v[y]={};}var vl=’Loader’,vli=v[y][vl],vsl=v[c][vl + ‘Script’],vlf=v[c][vl + ‘Loaded’],ve=’Embed’; if (!vsl){vsl=function(u,cb){ if(t){cb();return;}s=i.createElement(“script”);s.type=”text/javascript”;s.async=1;s.src=u; if(s.readyState){s.onreadystatechange=function(){if(s.readyState===”loaded”||s.readyState==”complete”){s.onreadystatechange=null;vlf=1;cb();}};}else{s.onload=function(){vlf=1;cb();};} i.getElementsByTagName(“head”)[0].appendChild(s); };} vsl(l+’loader.min.js’,function(){if(!vli){var vlc=v[c][vl];vli=new vlc();}vli.loadScript(l+’player.min.js’,function(){var vec=v[d][ve];t=new vec();t.run(a);});});})(window, document, ‘Vidalytics’, ‘vidalytics_embed_hjo0OUdu4Oi6L6Tl’, ‘https://fast.vidalytics.com/embeds/PqrXMwxV/hjo0OUdu4Oi6L6Tl/’);[/tcb-script]

Where to get your very own Swing Plate…

Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a small percentage on any purchases you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you! Click the button below to go to our partner’s site.

This product requires alignment sticks/rods to operate. One package on the checkout page includes them; one package DOESN’T include them. Make sure you select the product which is appropriate for you!

Here’s how the Swing Plate can help your game…

  • Almost automatically shallows out your downswing
  • Shallows it out at the exact same angle as tour players (and never even get one degree off)
  • Never try shallowing it out blindly again–and eliminate the risk of developing even worse swing mechanics!
  • Virtually eliminate off-plane swings by snapping The Swing Plate in place (not only does this get your swing on plane, but it automatically gives you the feeling of a proper shaft angle).
  • Shallows out even the STEEPEST downswing in a matter of minutes (if you’ve been trying to do this for months, this is the BEST way to get the feel of shallowing it out at just the right angle)!

Pictured above is the Swing Plate “Angle Finder”

Where to get your very own Swing Plate…

Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a small percentage on any purchases you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you! Click the button below to go to our partner’s site.

This product requires alignment sticks/rods to operate. One package on the checkout page includes them; one package DOESN’T include them. Make sure you select the product which is appropriate for you!

(The $20 discount will automatically apply when you go to the checkout page)
